title: Easeout Weekly #1
short: A weekly roundup of the latest web design & development news.
body:
![Neumorphism](/images/uploads/neumorphism-io.png) [Neumorphism.io](https://neumorphism.io/#55b9f3) A fun Neumorphic website for generating Soft-UI CSS code. [Try it! ➡️](https://neumorphism.io/#55b9f3)
![Svelte logo](/images/uploads/svelte-radiant.png) [Getting Acquainted With Svelte](https://css-tricks.com/getting-acquainted-with-svelte-the-new-framework-on-the-block/) Tristram Tolliday writes a nice introduction to Svelte, showing how it differs from other frameworks, and how to implement in your own projects. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/getting-acquainted-with-svelte-the-new-framework-on-the-block/)
![JavaScript texture](/images/uploads/js-pattern.png) [Why JavaScript is Eating HTML](https://css-tricks.com/why-javascript-is-eating-html/) A detailed roundup of the traditional approaches to web development, contrasted with the modern way of "JavaScripting everything". [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/why-javascript-is-eating-html/)
![React router](/images/uploads/react-router.jpg) [The Hooks of React Router](https://css-tricks.com/the-hooks-of-react-router/) A quick primer on the new hook patterns of React Router 5. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/the-hooks-of-react-router/)
![Console commands](/images/uploads/console-commands.png) [A Guide to Console Commands](https://css-tricks.com/a-guide-to-console-commands/) A comprehensive guide covering what’s available in the console object of both Firefox and Chrome. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/a-guide-to-console-commands/)
![Shoptalk podcast logo](/images/uploads/ShopTalk-browers.png) [The Browser Show](https://shoptalkshow.com/399/) A browser-focused episode of ShopTalk, including browser drama, CSS4 ideas and thoughts, moving HTML & CSS forward, and lazy loading. [Listen ➡️](https://shoptalkshow.com/399/)
![Vue countdown timers](/images/uploads/vie-countdown-timers.png) [Moving from Vanilla JavaScript to a Reusable Vue Component](https://css-tricks.com/moving-from-vanilla-javascript-to-a-reusable-vue-component/) A look at how to port vanilla JavaScript into a reusable Vue component, using basic features that the framework provides. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/moving-from-vanilla-javascript-to-a-reusable-vue-component/)
![Branding mascots](/images/uploads/brand-mascot-guide-tinypng-mascot.jpg) [What To Do If People Hate Your Brand Mascot](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/people-hate-brand-mascot-guide/) How to turn your hated brand mascot into one the people love. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/02/people-hate-brand-mascot-guide/)
![Pure CSS claw](/images/uploads/pure-css-claw.png) [Pure CSS Claw Crane](https://codepen.io/jkantner/full/abOBdgV) A fully functional pure CSS claw crane! [Try it! ➡️](https://codepen.io/jkantner/full/abOBdgV)
